SEARCH.QUERY: select Q_COLUMN_NAMES from Q_TABLE_NAME WHERE Q_CONDITIONS ;

CREATE_TABLE.QUERY: create table Q_TABLE_NAME (ID INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY) ;

ADD_COLUMN.QUERY: alter table Q_TABLE_NAME add Q_COLUMN_NAME Q_COLUMN_TYPE ;

DROP_COLUMN.QUERY: alter table Q_TABLE_NAME drop column Q_COLUMN_NAME ;

INSERT_ITEM.QUERY: insert into Q_TABLE_NAME Q_COLUMN_NAMES values Q_COLUMN_VALUES ;

UPDATE_ITEM.QUERY: update Q_TABLE_NAME set Q_SET_VALUES where Q_CONDITIONS ;
